question: [Practice] Norsk: Oppgi the slope of the noisy line for linjen som vises.

qas.question: [Practice] Norsk: Oppgi the slope of the noisy line for linjen som vises.
[Detailed] Portugues: Indique the intercept of the noisy line da linha representada.
[Detailed] English: Identify the value of y when x equals 1 for the plotted line.
